title: misc/swig/stdio: build failure on 1.2rc2 on darwin
body:
by **travis.cline**: 
On darwin_amd64 and darwin_386 (10.8.5) misc/swig/stdio both apple-provided clang and
gcc-4.8 fail to successfully run the swig examples.

Output of 'go test -v -x' for both compilers:

http://play.golang.org/p/-hxi4ywmgY
